name: GMTK Plays Tower Defense
description:
The game is a Tower Defense, but you play as someone watching a Twitch Plays stream!
At the beginning, you'll be the only one giving commands to the game, but as levels go up, more people will start to interact and mess with your gameplay.

You get money for every enemy you kill, money that you need to use to construct tower, and at the end of every round, ALL YOUR TOWERS ARE DESTROYED!

So good luck figthing against the chat to make your best strategy!

Can you kill all the enemies on all 10 waves?

It's a one man project, everything I did was live recorded on Twitch ( https://www.twitch.tv/seijih )

Game made on UE4, I've used assets from the Epic Games Store, most of them are from the "Infinity Series"

Thank you so much for playing!
